#load("data/d.RData")

# library
library(ggplot2)
 
# The mtcars dataset is proposed in R
data=d[["UserLanguage"]][["getLanguage"]]

t<-data[,c("label","nb_visits","nb_actions")]
t$nb_visits<-as.numeric(as.character(t$nb_visits))
t$nb_actions<-as.numeric(as.character(t$nb_actions))
t<-aggregate(cbind(nb_visits, nb_actions)~label, data=t, mean, na.rm=TRUE)

 
# 1/ add text with geom_text, use nudge to nudge the text
ggplot(t, aes(x=nb_visits, y=nb_actions)) +
  geom_point()
